ada migamuwa nagaraye ithamath darunu lesa pathirayana dengu wasangatha thathwayakata nagaraya muhunadi athi me mohothe, dengu uwadura mardhanaya kirima sadaha awashya niwaradi, sthirasara saha widyathmaka wisadum bhawithayakata gena eemata siya mulu shakthiya yodawa katayuthu nokara 'ayi mama muhudu wathura dammane wani' pradarshanathmaka saha boru palasthara wisadum walin migamuwe dengu wasangathaya pitudakimatath, migamuwa janayawa thambimatawath nohaki bawa migamuwa eksath jathika pakshaye sanwidhayaka, basnahira palath sabha manthri, royis wijitha pranandu mahathata menma nagarika manthri gihan pranandu mahathatada mathakkara diyayuthuya.
